iti106:2.1: “Sabrahmakani, bhikkhave, tani kulani yesam puttanam matapitaro ajjhagare pujita honti.
iti106:2.2: Sapubbadevatani, bhikkhave, tani kulani yesam puttanam matapitaro ajjhagare pujita honti.
iti106:2.3: Sapubbacariyakani, bhikkhave, tani kulani yesam puttanam matapitaro ajjhagare pujita honti.
iti106:2.4: Sahuneyyakani, bhikkhave, tani kulani yesam puttanam matapitaro ajjhagare pujita honti.
iti106:3.6: Bahukara, bhikkhave, matapitaro puttanam apadaka posaka imassa lokassa dassetaro”ti.
iti106:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
